summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all requirements for the profile system with photos and enhanced review uploads. Backend adds profilePhoto and photo fields to User and Review types with corresponding upload/update functions. Frontend implements profile pages for both customer and salon owners with image upload supporting gallery/camera, updates review submission with photo upload, displays review photos with click-to-enlarge, adds profile icon navigation in header, redirects users after profile setup, and includes a reviews dashboard for salon owners.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for data schema migration
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration functionality for upgrading existing user profiles and reviews with new photo fields was not requested in the BuildRequest
